column5: If ya got one I could use post it here... Ill give ya credit on the site of course.  I could use a brook trout photo as well...
How's this?
DanC and Guidofisherman both have better brooky pics than I have seen ANYWHERE!
Bojan...
Bojangles... perfect.. ill use the one with you in the picture... make ya famous..
I am assuming you want one with just the fish in it?    If you would like it, let me know and I can email you the full size pic.  Burt
Oooopps......to late
Here's a Brookie for ya!!
that is not a Brookie    that is Brookzilla !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
heres one with some colour
Here ... since I have purchased the original I suppose I have the right to let you use a photo of it   ...hmmm .. maybe not

Maybe there should be a warning added to this thread this morning. I think there will be a few coffee spitters this AM.  Good one Roy.  All nice fish BTW.
